resources.string: Forgot your password? Reset Hidden Mode. All hidden chats will be deleted.

Hey, join me on hike messenger!\n It\'s the only messaging app that is made in India! Get it now - http://hike.in/ and Hike up your life
Hey! Check out hike messenger. Now send Docs, PPTs, MP3s and more; up to 100MB each! Get it now - http://hike.in/ and Hike up your life
Hey, check out hike messenger. It has amazing stickers & stunning chat themes! Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. It let\'s you show your \'Last Seen\' only to select friends! Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. You can now hide your private chats from others. Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. You can chat with even those friends who are offline. Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!

Hike Direct is the new way to stay connected to your friends even when you’re out of data. It allows you to send messages and share files with your nearby friends absolutely free. There is no file size limit and you can send movies, videos, music, apps and whatever you want absolutely free of cost.
Condition 1:Your friend is within 100 meters of you.Of course the closer you are , the better the connection!
Condition 2:To start a connection , also ask your friend to tap on Hike Direct option from your chat.
Does Hike Direct work for group chats as well ?
As of now, Hike Direct only works for 1:1 chats. It doesn’t work for group chats. Stay tuned in for updates on this space.
Something went wrong.Please try again in a while
Hike Stickey offers multiple features like sharing stickers on messaging apps etc. Please enable and turn it ON.
Hike needs Accessibility Services to be enabled for this feature. Please tap here and select Hike
Hike needs Accessibility Service to be enabled for this feature. Tap ENABLE and select Hike

I just downloaded the new hike messenger. What a big change from WhatsApp!

It's got amazing stickers, the ability to hide my chats and some really cool chat themes. 

Download it now from http://get.hike.in/$invite_token

Hey, join me on hike, the only messaging app made in India! It lets you hide your chats, send messages to friends when they\'re offline and send awesome stickers. \n\nAlso share all types of files - docs, songs, movies etc, up to 100MB each - Download: http://get.hike.in/
Hey, check out hike messenger. It has awesome stickers in our language! Join the only made in India messaging app- Download at http://hike.in/$invite_token
